thread.title: Single Lane Closure, SR 739, Shohola Township

title: Single Lane Closure, SR 739, Shohola Township
text: Single Lane Closure, SR 739, Shohola Township Comment Posted Jul. 2, 2015 at 1:06 PM Posted Jul. 2, 2015 at 1:06 PM Shohola â€“ As part of an upcoming bridge replacement project, the bridge on SR 739 over Shohola Creek in Shohola Township is in a single lane pattern. Traffic is currently being controlled by a stop sign, but tomorrow a temporary traffic signal will be in place until further notice.   Posted Jul. 2, 2015 at 1:06 PM
